description: Internal TEKsystems employee that focuses on providing solutions to our client’s business & technology needs. Ensures we place quality (technical & cultural fit) consultants.
An experienced recruiter that also manages the operational aspects of a current, high-volume account.
An account manager whose responsibilities also include the support and development of 1-3 new recruiters (also known as a “pod”).
An experienced recruiter that also assumes responsibility for the support and development of 1-3 new recruiters (also known as a “pod”).
A director responsible for managing a small group of offices, within a specific region; they partner with DBOs to support and grow individual field offices.
Internal TEKsystems job focusing on selling and developing our Global Services practice in the local market.
Provides exceptional customer service to clients by delivering timely and accurate billing. Partners with clients to stay current and continue using our services to achieve their goals.
Partners with Recruiters and Account Managers to create a positive experience for consultants by ensuring they are paid timely and accurately.
Provides exceptional customer service to clients by delivering timely and accurate billing. Partners with clients to stay current and continue using our services to achieve their goals.
This are almost identical to the CSA, only difference is that they are only in offices that have undergone the “Evolve” transition.
This are almost identical to the CSS, only difference is that they are only in offices that have undergone the “Evolve” transition.
Responsible for daily operations of a branch office (e.g., office productivity, morale, professional development, profit & loss, etc.).
Solicits national business and manages the proposal process for supplemental services/projects.
A recruiter that works for the TEKsystems National Recruiting Center. While they physically sit in one market, they recruit on business across the country.
Internal TEKsystems job focusing on developing customer strategy and helping new/underperforming AMs grow spread within their territories. Typically a senior/successful Account Manager.

Internal TEKsystems job focusing on driving strategy around getting a requirement up to presenting a candidate and closing the business. Heavy focus on D4 (steps 2-5 of the DBC). Works to improve performance with Recruiters and Account Managers.
Internal TEKsystems job focusing on overseeing a team of sellers nationwide that support one account driving overall company strategy to approach the specific customer.

Responsible for productivity (e.g., customer share, aggregate spread, client retention, etc.), morale, professional development and attrition for assigned region (i.e., Midwest, Northwest, Central, Northeast, Southeast and Canada).
